title: Castrol Syntron X
description_ru: Одно из первых масел для автомобилей уровня supercar (премиальные и спортивные автомобили), первая синтетика Castrol;
description_en: One of the earliest motor oils formulated specifically for supercar-level vehicles (premium and high-performance sports cars); Castrol's very first fully synthetic oil.

title: Shell TMO часть 1
description_ru: Минеральное, а затем и синтетическое масло для автомобилей уровня supercar от Shell;
description_en: A mineral-based oil that later evolved into a synthetic variant, developed by Shell specifically for supercar-level premium and high-performance vehicles.

title: Shell TMO часть 2
description_en: Continuation of Shell's groundbreaking TMO line, further detailing its evolution and applications in high-performance engines.

title: Phillips 66 Trop-Artic
description_ru: Уникальное название Trop-Artic компании Manhattan Oil было выкуплено компанией Phillips для отдельного эпохального масла, которое продержалось на рыке более 50 лет;
description_en: The distinctive Trop-Artic name, originally from Manhattan Oil, was acquired by Phillips 66 for this landmark motor oil that remained on the market for over 50 years.

title: BP Energol
description_ru: Первое в истории масло 10W-40;
description_en: The world's first motor oil in the groundbreaking 10W-40 viscosity grade.

title: Esso Uniflo (вводная)
description_ru: Первое масло - неофициально multigrade (10-30) в 1930-х;
description_en: The earliest motor oil to unofficially exhibit multigrade characteristics (equivalent to 10W-30) in the 1930s.

title: Esso Uniflo часть 1
description_ru: Первое масло - multigrade вообще;
description_en: The very first true multigrade motor oil in history.

title: Esso Uniflo часть 2
description_ru: Первое в истории масло 5W-20;
description_en: The first motor oil ever formulated in the innovative 5W-20 viscosity grade.

title: Union76 Royal Triton
description_ru: Масло фиолетового цвета - уникальное премиальное минеральное моторное масло 1950-х - 1960-х;
description_en: Iconic purple-colored premium mineral motor oil from the 1950s and 1960s, renowned for its distinctive appearance and superior performance.

title: Castrol Syntec FSX
description_ru: То самое масло из-за "синтетики" которого поспорили Mobil и Castrol. Содержало уникальные эстеры, но перешло полностью на HC;
description_en: The infamous oil at the center of the Mobil vs. Castrol 'synthetic' legal dispute; originally featured unique ester bases but later transitioned fully to hydrocracked (HC) components.

title: Pennzoil Mult-vis
description_ru: Одно из самых продаваемых масел PCMO за всю историю. Судебное разбирательство по рекламе этого масла установило, что "механически крепкий полимер" - не является важным элементом превсоходства;
description_en: One of the best-selling passenger car motor oils (PCMO) in history; a landmark advertising lawsuit clarified that 'mechanically strong polymers' were not essential for superior performance.

title: SOHIO QVO
description_ru: Первое в истории масло 5W-40;
description_en: The world's first motor oil in the pioneering 5W-40 viscosity grade.

title: Amoco LDO
description_ru: Одно из первых LL-масел - 6000 миль для самого начала 1960-х;
description_en: One of the earliest long-life (LL) motor oils, offering an impressive 6,000-mile drain interval in the early 1960s.

title: Quaker State Super Blend
description_ru: Исторически значимое масло великой компании Quaker State;
description_en: A historically significant motor oil from the renowned Quaker State company, celebrated for its innovative formulation and enduring legacy.

title: Mobil 1 C40 GT
description_ru: Знаменитое Mobil esp x2 0W-20 (от самого Douglas Edward Deckman из XOM) только загущенное до SAE40;
description_en: The renowned Mobil ESP x2 0W-20 formula (developed by Douglas Edward Deckman at ExxonMobil), thickened to meet SAE 40 specifications for enhanced performance.

title: Shell Fire & Ice
description_ru: Одно из самых ярких моторных масел Shell конца 1970-х;
description_en: One of Shell's most iconic and visually striking motor oils from the late 1970s, known for its bold marketing and advanced protection.

title: Mobiloil Special часть 1
description_ru: Масло-эпоха;
description_en: A true era-defining motor oil that shaped the early standards of engine lubrication.

title: Mobiloil Special часть 2
description_en: Further exploration of the legendary Mobiloil Special, highlighting its enduring influence on motor oil development.

title: Mobiloil Gargoyle
description_ru: Название, которое было изменено во время WW2;
description_en: An iconic brand name that was changed during World War II for patriotic and marketing reasons.

title: Mobil 1 Rally Formula
description_ru: Первое официально спортивное моторное масло Mobil 1;
description_en: The first officially designated racing motor oil in the Mobil 1 lineup.

title: Veedol
description_ru: Бренд, который дал очень много миру PCMO (Veedol Synthron было первым 5W-40 для европейского рынка, который оказался не готов к этом грейду);
description_en: A brand that contributed immensely to the world of passenger car motor oils (PCMO); Veedol Synthron was the first 5W-40 introduced to the European market, which proved ahead of its time.

title: Gulfpride Formula G
description_ru: Gulfpride Formula G - супер-спорт конца 1960-х;
description_en: Gulfpride Formula G – a super-sport high-performance oil from the late 1960s.

title: Texaco Havoline Supreme
description_ru: Havoline - "столетнее" масло;
description_en: Havoline – a truly 'century-old' motor oil with a rich and enduring heritage.

title: G-oil 10W-30
description_ru: Масло от Dr. SAE20;
description_en: A remarkable motor oil championed and endorsed by the renowned Dr. SAE20.

title: Shell Golden часть 1
description_ru: В конце 1939 года - как награду для лучших агентов и дилеров масла Golden Shell - Shell заказала 30 000 швейцарских часов;
description_en: In late 1939, as a reward for top agents and dealers of Golden Shell oil, Shell commissioned 30,000 Swiss watches.

title: Shell Golden часть 2
description_en: Continuation of the fascinating story behind Shell Golden oil and its legendary promotional campaign.

title: SOHIO Duron
description_ru: Первое в истории масло 5W-30;
description_en: The world's first motor oil in the revolutionary 5W-30 viscosity grade.

title: Sunoco Special
description_ru: Легенда от великой компании (один из первых брендов PCMO в истории PCMO);
description_en: A legendary oil from a great company; one of the earliest branded passenger car motor oils (PCMO) in history.

title: Три первых W-масла [Mobiloil, Conoco, Standard Oil Indiana]
description_ru: Первые масла зимних (W) грейдов начала 1930-х;
description_en: The first three winter-grade (W) motor oils introduced in the early 1930s by Mobiloil, Conoco, and Standard Oil Indiana.

title: Valvoline Restore & Protect
description_ru: Самое модное моторное масло 2024 и 2025 в США. Революция в области моющих свойств и хелатирования;
description_en: The most fashionable and talked-about motor oil in the USA for 2024 and 2025; a revolution in cleaning properties and metal chelation technology.

title: Mobil 1 esp x2
description_ru: Знаменитое Mobil esp x2 0W-20 (от самого Douglas Edward Deckman из XOM). Первое масло гениального допуска VW 508;
description_en: The famous Mobil ESP x2 0W-20 (developed by Douglas Edward Deckman at ExxonMobil); the first oil to meet the ingenious VW 508.00 specification.

title: Zic Zero
description_ru: Якобы содержит Ионные Жидкости, воспетые самим Dr. SAE20;
description_en: Allegedly formulated with ionic liquids, highly praised and celebrated by Dr. SAE20 himself.

title: Kendall SuperB
description_ru: Первое в истории (официально) масло 10W-30;
description_en: The first officially recognized motor oil in the 10W-30 viscosity grade.

title: Amoco Ultimate
description_ru: Одно из первых PAO-масел начала 1980-х. Выражение Ultimate в названии масла - легко в основу знаменитых марок топлива Amoco, BP, Aral;
description_en: One of the earliest PAO-based motor oils from the early 1980s; the 'Ultimate' branding influenced the naming of famous Amoco, BP, and Aral premium fuels.

title: Mobiloil Arctic часть 1
description_ru: Mesmerizing - только такое слово подходит к этим эпохальным «зимним» моторным маслам;
description_en: Mesmerizing – the only word fitting for these epochal 'winter' motor oils that captivated the industry.

title: Mobiloil Arctic часть 2
description_en: Further details on the captivating legacy of Mobiloil Arctic winter-grade oils.

title: Motul 300V
description_ru: 300V в представлении не нуждается. Круче не бывает;
description_en: Motul 300V needs no introduction – quite simply, the pinnacle of motor oil performance.

title: Invader
description_ru: Все масла Invader входили в ТОП-20 первых PCMO до 1917 года;
description_en: All Invader oils ranked in the top 20 earliest passenger car motor oils (PCMO) before 1917.

title: D-X extrinol
description_ru: Масло с extrinol - это почти масло с chemaloy, но это масло с extrinol!
description_en: An oil featuring Extrinol additive – nearly akin to Chemaloy, but distinctly its own with Extrinol technology.

title: Pennzoil Synthetic Pennzane
description_ru: Единственное масло в истории PCMO с добавлением MAC;
description_en: The only passenger car motor oil (PCMO) in history to incorporate multiply alkylated cyclopentane (MAC) additives.

title: Valvoline FourGard
description_ru: FourGard специально разработано для четырёх-цилиндровых двигателей! Что может быть круче;
description_en: FourGard was specially engineered for four-cylinder engines – an unparalleled level of targeted innovation.

title: Oilzum
description_en: A classic and highly regarded early motor oil brand with a storied place in automotive history.

title: Shell XMO
description_ru: Масло Shell идеально прошедшее прожарку (по заверениям Shell). Выпускалось только для жары и сурово-жаркого климата;
description_en: Shell oil claimed to perfectly withstand extreme heat testing; produced exclusively for hot and severely hot climates.

title: Macmillan Ring-Free
description_en: Macmillan Ring-Free – a pioneering oil renowned for its anti-ring-sticking properties and innovative formulation.

title: All proof
description_en: All Proof – an early premium motor oil celebrated for its all-around protection and reliability.

title: Castrol XL
description_ru: Первое масло с растворимым модификатором трения: соединение вольфрама;
description_en: The first motor oil to incorporate a soluble friction modifier: a tungsten compound.

title: Kendall GT-1
description_en: Kendall GT-1 – a high-performance icon known for its racing heritage and superior lubrication.

title: Prestone
description_ru: Первое потребительское синтетическое масло PCMO. Вышло в 1945 году;
description_en: The first consumer-available synthetic passenger car motor oil (PCMO), introduced in 1945.

title: Shell X-100 часть 1
description_en: The legendary Shell X-100 series – a premium multigrade oil that set new standards in the industry.

title: Shell X-100 часть 2
description_en: Continued exploration of Shell X-100's impact and innovations in motor oil technology.

title: Sinclair Dino
description_en: Sinclair Dino – a classic oil with iconic dinosaur branding and strong performance legacy.

title: Valvoline Chemaloy
description_ru: Chemaloy - этого достаточно. Это так круто, что даже Pennzoil Z-7 уступит;
description_en: Valvoline Chemaloy – legendary in its own right, so advanced that even Pennzoil Z-7 pales in comparison.

title: Mobil SHC
description_ru: Первое PAO масло;
description_en: The first fully PAO-based synthetic motor oil.

title: Mobil 1 SuperSyn
description_en: Mobil 1 SuperSyn – an advanced evolution of the Mobil 1 lineup featuring enhanced SuperSyn anti-wear technology.

title: Union 76 Triton
description_ru: С 1946 года - активное применение ZDDP в моторном масле. Официально - первое масло с постоянным содержанием ZDDP;
description_en: From 1946 onward, active use of ZDDP in motor oil; officially the first with consistent ZDDP content.

title: Kendall The 2000 mile oil
description_en: Kendall 'The 2000 Mile Oil' – revolutionary for guaranteeing extended drain intervals in its era.

title: Zerolene и Polarine
description_en: Zerolene and Polarine – pioneering early motor oils from the dawn of the automotive age.

title: Conoco Nᵗʰ
description_en: Conoco Nᵗʰ – an innovative and highly regarded formulation from Conoco's historic lineup.

title: Sinclair Triple-X
description_ru: Для одной из версий этого масла впервые применили частичную замену ZDDP: замена - комплексные растворимые соединения никеля
description_en: One version of this oil pioneered the partial replacement of ZDDP with soluble nickel complex compounds.
